MANAGE_FEATURE.description: Allows users to create, update, and manage application features.
MANAGE_FEATURE.title: Manage application features

MANAGE_ORGANIZATION.description: Allows users to create, update, and manage organization-related settings and configurations.
MANAGE_ORGANIZATION.title: Manage organization details and configuration

MANAGE_ROLE.description: Grants users the ability to create, update, and delete roles, as well as manage role-based permissions.
MANAGE_ROLE.title: Manage roles

MANAGE_USER.description: Enables users to create, update, deactivate, or delete user accounts, including role assignments.
MANAGE_USER.title: Manage users

READ_ANALYTICS.description: Allows users to access and review application analytics for monitoring and troubleshooting purposes.
READ_ANALYTICS.title: View analytics

READ_ERROR.description: Allows users to access and review application error logs for monitoring and troubleshooting purposes.
READ_ERROR.title: View error logs

READ_FEATURE.description: Allows users to access and review application features.
READ_FEATURE.title: View application features

READ_ORGANIZATION.description: Enables users to view organization details, such as company information, structure, and associated entities.
READ_ORGANIZATION.title: View organization details

READ_ROLE.description: Permits users to view role definitions, including assigned permissions and access levels.
READ_ROLE.title: View roles

READ_USER.description: Allows users to view user accounts, including basic details and assigned roles.
READ_USER.title: View users
